SummaryEnglish: Years after New Century Zero, the Zoids battles have shifted scenes to the coliseum. There is something new about this year's Zoids battles. It seems that many Zoids can fuse together for enhanced power and speed. Can RD and his Mach Storm Team successfully compete against these new Zoids Fuzors? Will they unlock the secrets to fusing for their Zoids before it is too late? There's also a new organization lurking in the shadows of Blue City, can RD win battles against the powerful enemy Zoids AND prevent this dark scheme? Stay Tuned!

1.SummaryEnglish: New Zoids, new heroes, and new battles are shown as Team Mach Storm figures out the best way to help RD's skills improve, and what will be the next stage in Zoid evolution? Find out.

2.SummaryEnglish: Team Mach Storm must figure out the next stage in Zoid evolution: the ability to fuse, before going into battle with the Dark Spiner team.

3.SummaryEnglish: Savage Head has discovered the Fuzor partner for the Berserk Fury in the Buster Eagle, and now they want to use that technology to destroy RD and Liger Zero. Can Mach Storm's first fuzor be discovered to save Liger Zero?

4.SummaryEnglish: RD ponders the power that Liger Zero will have when he can fuse with Fire Phoenix, but will the Fire Phoenix actaully allow him to become a fuzor pilot?

5.SummaryEnglish: With Liger Zero Phoenix around, RD has been getting cocky. It causes Hop to suspend him, but when a kid named Matt runs into RD, Mach Storm's future will be changed forever.

6.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious man named Halldo arrives with a mission for Mach Storm, but can RD and Sigma work out there differences to allow the mission to be completed successfully when Helmut isn't around to stop there arguing?

7.SummaryEnglish: Fuzors continue to be discovered across the country, but one Zoid pilot is determined to show that Fuzors aren't the future of Zoids Evolution. Now it's up to Mach Storm and the Peace Keeping Bureau to stop him, but can they even discover what this invisible Zoid is doing?

8.SummaryEnglish: With the Boldguard gone, Sigma decides he doesn't want to battle anymore. Can Halldo change his mind? Also, what is the history between Amy and Keefe?

9.SummaryEnglish: Zoid thiefs arrive in Blue City with the objective to steal Liger Zero. Can RD and Matt help the Peace Keeping Bureau stop these thieves while RD is suspended and Ciao is being tricked?

10.SummaryEnglish: A man named Marvis escapes jail with one mission: get revenge on Helmut and Mach Storm for the last 3 years. When Liger Zero Phoenix gets cut off from the battle, it's up to Helmut and Sigma to find their Fuzor partners to keep from being destroyed. What Zoids will they be?

11.SummaryEnglish: RD is invited to be in a 5 man Battle Royal, but what will happen to him when all the others team up to destroy Liger Zero Phoenix? Also, why is Sweet a part of Mach Storm? The answers will all be revealed.

12.SummaryEnglish: Can more than one Zoid fuse together, and if so, which ones will they be?

13.SummaryEnglish: How can RD and Mach Storm get revenge on the Fuzor Matrix Dragon?

14.SummaryEnglish: The Berserk Fury has a new fusing partner, but can RD manage to beat it, or is the fight over for Liger Zero or Fire Phoenix?

15.SummaryEnglish: After losing Fire Phoenix, RD must figure out a way to defeat his opponents, but will he get over his emotional breakdown first?

16.SummaryEnglish: RD must find a way to make Liger Zero stronger once more, but can he do it without an old friend, or will his friend return in a new form?

17.SummaryEnglish: The Mach Storm team tests the new Jet Falcon, a new combiner partner with Ligre Zero, to see if it works, but when a Whale King is attacked in the sky, its up to them to save the day, but how can they when they are being attacked by the Energy Liger?

18.SummaryEnglish: The Mach Storm team must battle the new Black Impact team, but which team will end up triumphant?

19.SummaryEnglish: Mysterious Zoid assassins show up and begin attacking everyone. What will happen?

20.SummaryEnglish: Luke turns against the Black Impact team, but for what reasons?

21.TitleEnglish: The Water's Surface and the Under Current
21.SummaryEnglish: Blake and company are targeted by a new group, and now they must turn to the Peace Keeping Bureau for help. What will happen?

22.TitleEnglish: Rampage of the God of Destruction
22.SummaryEnglish: What happens when Mach Storm finds out one of there own may have turned against everything they believe in?

23.SummaryEnglish: Marvis returns as the new head of the Peace Keeping Bureau, and he has one mission, eliminate Mach Storm at all costs. What helps him even more is that the Peace Keeping Bureau has been given new assignments. Can Mach Storm rebound?

24.SummaryEnglish: RICHTER SCALE is ruling Blue City and opressing its citizens. Can RD and Blake defeat RICHTER SCALE?

25.SummaryEnglish: SEISMOSAURUS has a Zi-unizon with LASER STORM and SCISSOR STORM and becomes ULTIMATE SEISMO (heavy armoured mode). Now that he is more powerful he challenges the Zi-fighters!

26.SummaryEnglish: SEISMOSAURUS achieves a more powerful Zi-unizon with Stylu Armor and becomes BERSERK SEISMO! Can the Zi-fighters defeat it?
